targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  updated_at AS "time",
  follower_count
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT
  updated_at AS "time",
  tweet_count
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT
  updated_at AS "time",
  follower_count
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN is_follower=TRUE AND is_following=TRUE THEN 'friend'
    WHEN is_follower=TRUE AND is_following=FALSE THEN 'follower'
    WHEN is_follower=FALSE AND is_following=TRUE THEN 'following'
    ELSE 'unkown' 
  END,
  count(*)
FROM users
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN is_follower=TRUE AND is_following=TRUE THEN 'friend'
    WHEN is_follower=TRUE AND is_following=FALSE THEN 'follower'
    WHEN is_follower=FALSE AND is_following=TRUE THEN 'following'
    ELSE 'unkown' 
  END

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN is_following=TRUE THEN 'Friend'
    WHEN is_following=FALSE THEN 'Follower'
  END,
  count(*)
FROM users
WHERE is_follower = TRUE
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN is_following=TRUE THEN 'Friend'
    WHEN is_following=FALSE THEN 'Follower'
  END

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN is_follower=TRUE THEN 'Friend'
    WHEN is_follower=FALSE THEN 'Following'
  END,
  count(*)
FROM users
WHERE is_following = TRUE
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN is_follower=TRUE THEN 'Friend'
    WHEN is_follower=FALSE THEN 'Following'
  END

SELECT
  updated_at AS "time",
  following_count
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT
  updated_at AS "time",
  listed_count
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM events
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND event = 'new_follower'

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM events
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND event = 'lost_follower'

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM events
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND event = 'cancel_following'

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM events
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND event = 'new_following'

SELECT
  MAX(follower_count) - MIN(follower_count)
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)

SELECT
  MAX(following_count) - MIN(following_count)
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)

SELECT
  MAX(tweet_count) - MIN(tweet_count)
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)

SELECT
  MAX(listed_count) - MIN(listed_count)
FROM stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(updated_at)

SELECT
  u.profile_image as profile,
  CONCAT(u.name, ' (', u.user_name, ')') as name,
  u.user_name,
  u.follower_count as follower, 
  u.tweet_count as tweet,
  u.listed_count as listed,
  u.last_active as 'last tweet'
FROM events e
JOIN users u ON u.id = e.user_id
WHERE e.event='new_follower' AND u.is_follower = true AND $__timeFilter(e.created_at)
ORDER BY created_at desc
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  u.profile_image as profile,
  CONCAT(u.name, ' (', u.user_name, ')') as name,
  u.user_name,
  u.follower_count as follower, 
  u.tweet_count as tweet,
  u.listed_count as listed
FROM events e
JOIN users u ON u.id = e.user_id
WHERE e.event='lost_follower' AND u.is_follower = false AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY created_at desc
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  u.profile_image as profile,
  CONCAT(u.name, ' (', u.user_name, ')') as name,
  u.user_name,
  u.follower_count as follower, 
  u.tweet_count as tweet,
  u.listed_count as listed
FROM events e
JOIN users u ON u.id = e.user_id
WHERE e.event='new_following' AND u.is_following = true AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY created_at desc
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  u.profile_image as profile,
  CONCAT(u.name, ' (', u.user_name, ')') as name,
  u.user_name,
  u.follower_count as follower, 
  u.tweet_count as tweet,
  u.listed_count as listed
FROM events e
JOIN users u ON u.id = e.user_id
WHERE e.event='cancel_following' AND u.is_following = false AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY created_at desc
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  DATE(CONVERT_TZ(created_at, "UTC", "$TZ")) as "time",
  COUNT(*) as count,
  event as event
FROM events
WHERE (event='new_follower' OR event='lost_follower') AND CONVERT_TZ(created_at, "UTC", "$TZ") > DATE(CONVERT_TZ($__timeTo(), "UTC", "$TZ")) - INTERVAL $TREND DAY + INTERVAL 1 DAY
GROUP BY DATE(CONVERT_TZ(created_at, "UTC", "$TZ")), event
ORDER BY DATE(CONVERT_TZ(created_at, "UTC", "$TZ"))

SELECT s1.time as time, s1.tweet - s2.tweet as tweet FROM
(SELECT DATE(CONVERT_TZ(updated_at, "UTC", "$TZ")) as time, MAX(tweet_count) as tweet FROM stats WHERE CONVERT_TZ(updated_at, "UTC", "$TZ") > DATE(CONVERT_TZ($__timeTo(), "UTC", "$TZ")) - INTERVAL $TREND DAY GROUP BY time) s1
JOIN
(SELECT DATE(CONVERT_TZ(updated_at, "UTC", "$TZ")) as time, MAX(tweet_count) as tweet FROM stats WHERE CONVERT_TZ(updated_at, "UTC", "$TZ") > DATE(CONVERT_TZ($__timeTo(), "UTC", "$TZ")) - INTERVAL $TREND DAY - INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY time) s2
ON s1.time = s2.time + INTERVAL 1 DAY

SELECT
  profile_image as profile, CONCAT(name, ' (', user_name, ')') as name, user_name, follower_count as follower, following_count as following, tweet_count as tweet, last_active as 'last tweet', updated_at as 'update time'
FROM users
WHERE is_follower=true
ORDER BY follower_count DESC

SELECT
  profile_image as profile, CONCAT(name, ' (', user_name, ')') as name, user_name, follower_count as follower, following_count as following, tweet_count as tweet, last_active as 'last tweet', updated_at as 'update time'
FROM users
WHERE is_following=true
ORDER BY follower_count DESC

SELECT
  profile_image as profile, CONCAT(name, ' (', user_name, ')') as name, user_name, follower_count
FROM users
WHERE
  is_follower = TRUE AND is_following = TRUE
ORDER BY follower_count desc
limit 100

SELECT
  profile_image as profile, CONCAT(name, ' (', user_name, ')') as name, user_name, follower_count as follower, tweet_count as tweet, last_active as 'last tweet'
FROM users
WHERE
  is_following = FALSE AND is_follower = TRUE AND last_active = (SELECT MAX(last_active) FROM users) AND follower_count > (SELECT AVG(follower_count) FROM users WHERE is_follower=TRUE)
ORDER BY follower_count/(tweet_count+1)/(tweet_count+1) desc
limit 20

SELECT
  created_at AS "time",
  level, message
FROM logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
ORDER BY created_at desc limit 50

SELECT
  *
FROM sys

SELECT
  started_at AS "time",
  completed_at - started_at as duration
FROM iterations
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at)
ORDER BY started_at

list.description: Affects how Trend panels calculate dates
list.label: Time Zone
list.name: TZ
